content: ऋक्षः [ऋष्-स किच्च <ls>Uṇ. 3. 66</ls>] {@--1@} A bear; <ls>Ms. 12. 67.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a mountain. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (भल्लक). --क्षः, --क्षं {@--1@} A star, constellation, lunar mansion; <ls>Ms. 2. 101</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">3. 9</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">6. 10.</ls> {@--2@} A sign of the zodiac. {@--3@} A star under which a man happens to be born. --क्षाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) The seven stars called Pleiades; afterwards the seven Ṛṣis; <ls>R. 12. 25.</ls> --क्षा The north. --क्षी A female bear. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>Gr.</ab> {%arkos%}; <ab>L.</ab> {%ursus%}].
